newsitem.title: INDIA: INDIAN IPO - Adharshila Cap Svcs Ltd opening Oct 8.
newsitem.headline: INDIAN IPO - Adharshila Cap Svcs Ltd opening Oct 8.

text.p: The following initial public issue (IPO) by India's Adharshila Capital Services Ltd is expected to be open for public subscription on October 8:

Public issue of equity from Adharshila Capital is to augment the capital base and long term resources. Part of the funds collected will also be used for the acquisition of infrastructure facilities and to meet the expenses of the public issue.

The company is now into the stock market and intercorporate deposits. Future plans include expansion in scale in the existing activity and diversification into leasing and hire purchase. The company propose direct marketing of industrial leasing and hire purchase by way of contacting potential borrowers screened on the basis of carefully evolved appraisal norms.

Though the company has been in existence since 1993 the total income shown for the year ended May 1996 is only 190,000 rupees. The offer letter does not given any projections on the future financial position of the company.
